Family History: A Primer

sections.content: This is a lesson, presented as a stack of cards. You can swipe up to move forward.
To go back you can swipe down. Go ahead, we'll still be here when you get back.

Well done!

Family History: A Primer is designed to teach you family history a few minutes at a time.
Each lesson is a bite-sized nugget of information organized into cards. Each lesson may have multiple types of cards.
On the next card you drag the question to either yes or no to answer each question. Go ahead and give it a go.
